description: Hanging to see more puupies besides sharing pics.
My puppy loves everything music, with the expection of children's stuff. Especially the Wiggles.
Mikey Spends the days roaming the back country of Alberta, Canada looking for someone who will cherish and respect him.
One of the few comic book nerd who someday wishes to have his bones replaced with adamantium.
A relaxed, sweet, sentimental puppy who likes to sit by the window and watch the snow fall.
An barking puppy with an bong name. If you borrow barb, please return her with a better name.
Not to be confused with a hot dude in town, Halo is a theatrical puppy who longs to appear on the silver screen of your heart.
